original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee (LKR) has depreciated against the US Dollar (USD) today compared to last week, according to the Central Bank of Sri Lanka.
Accordingly, today's buying rate of USD is Rs 290.06 while the selling rate is Rs. 303.73.
Last Friday's buying rate of USD was Rs. 288.08 while the selling rate was Rs. 301.12.
